name: Hero Killer Zombie Outbreak
description:
Hero Killer Zombie Outbreak!!!
Play as a cowboy shooting zombies in Wild West. It is so easy to play. Just tap on the fire and jump buttons in time. As the cowboy running and jumping, more and more zombies confront. Don't let a zombie come near you which ends the game
- Easy control first person shooter zombie.
- Play Beautiful Ones zombie jack and monster games free for kids all.
- Store ammunition Among the many special weapons
